frames.caption: A person with closed eyes holds their face with both hands, their skin appearing cracked and dry like parched earth. The texture of the skin resembles a desert landscape, emphasizing a sense of vulnerability and fragility.
frames.description: The scene depicts a close-up of a person whose skin is artistically rendered to look like cracked earth. The setting is minimal, focusing on the texture and expression of the individual.

frames.caption: A person with closed eyes is covered in cracked, dry clay, giving an impression of being part of the earth. Their hands gently cradle their face, emphasizing the texture of the clay. The scene conveys a sense of stillness and introspection.
frames.description: The image depicts a close-up of a person whose skin is covered in cracked clay, creating an earthy, natural appearance. The setting is minimalistic, focusing on the texture and expression of the subject.

summary: People: person. Objects: cracked skin, clay. Actions: holding face, cradling face. Emotions: serenity, vulnerability, introspection, calm. Scenes: portrait, close-up. Concepts: nature, fragility, earth, stillness
